11#ifndef PC_WEBRTC_SESSION_DESCRIPTION_FACTORY_H_
12#define PC_WEBRTC_SESSION_DESCRIPTION_FACTORY_H_
13
14#include <stdint.h>
15
16#include <functional>
17#include <memory>
18#include <queue>
19#include <string>
20
21#include "api/jsep.h"
22#include "api/peer_connection_interface.h"
23#include "api/scoped_refptr.h"
24#include "p2p/base/transport_description.h"
25#include "p2p/base/transport_description_factory.h"
26#include "pc/channel_manager.h"
27#include "pc/media_session.h"
28#include "pc/sdp_state_provider.h"
29#include "rtc_base/constructor_magic.h"
30#include "rtc_base/message_handler.h"
31#include "rtc_base/rtc_certificate.h"
32#include "rtc_base/rtc_certificate_generator.h"
33#include "rtc_base/third_party/sigslot/sigslot.h"
34#include "rtc_base/thread.h"
35#include "rtc_base/thread_message.h"
36#include "rtc_base/unique_id_generator.h"
37
38namespace webrtc {
39
40// DTLS certificate request callback class.
41class WebRtcCertificateGeneratorCallback
42 : public rtc::RTCCertificateGeneratorCallback {
43 public:
44 // |rtc::RTCCertificateGeneratorCallback| overrides.
45 void OnSuccess(
46 const rtc::scoped_refptr<rtc::RTCCertificate>& certificate) override;
47 void OnFailure() override;
48
49 sigslot::signal0<> SignalRequestFailed;
50 sigslot::signal1<const rtc::scoped_refptr<rtc::RTCCertificate>&>
51 SignalCertificateReady;
52};
53
54struct CreateSessionDescriptionRequest {
55 enum Type {
56 kOffer,
57 kAnswer,
58 };
59
60 CreateSessionDescriptionRequest(Type type,
61 CreateSessionDescriptionObserver* observer,
62 const cricket::MediaSessionOptions& options)
63 : type(type), observer(observer), options(options) {}
64
65 Type type;
66 rtc::scoped_refptr<CreateSessionDescriptionObserver> observer;
67 cricket::MediaSessionOptions options;
68};
69
70// This class is used to create offer/answer session description. Certificates
71// for WebRtcSession/DTLS are either supplied at construction or generated
72// asynchronously. It queues the create offer/answer request until the
73// certificate generation has completed, i.e. when OnCertificateRequestFailed or
74// OnCertificateReady is called.
75class WebRtcSessionDescriptionFactory : public rtc::MessageHandler,
76 public sigslot::has_slots<> {
77 public:
78 // Can specify either a |cert_generator| or |certificate| to enable DTLS. If
79 // a certificate generator is given, starts generating the certificate
80 // asynchronously. If a certificate is given, will use that for identifying
81 // over DTLS. If neither is specified, DTLS is disabled.
82 WebRtcSessionDescriptionFactory(
83 rtc::Thread* signaling_thread,
84 cricket::ChannelManager* channel_manager,
85 const SdpStateProvider* sdp_info,
86 const std::string& session_id,
87 bool dtls_enabled,
88 std::unique_ptr<rtc::RTCCertificateGeneratorInterface> cert_generator,
89 const rtc::scoped_refptr<rtc::RTCCertificate>& certificate,
90 rtc::UniqueRandomIdGenerator* ssrc_generator,
91 std::function<void(const rtc::scoped_refptr<rtc::RTCCertificate>&)>
92 on_certificate_ready);
93 virtual ~WebRtcSessionDescriptionFactory();
94
95 static void CopyCandidatesFromSessionDescription(
96 const SessionDescriptionInterface* source_desc,
97 const std::string& content_name,
98 SessionDescriptionInterface* dest_desc);
99
100 void CreateOffer(
101 CreateSessionDescriptionObserver* observer,
102 const PeerConnectionInterface::RTCOfferAnswerOptions& options,
103 const cricket::MediaSessionOptions& session_options);
104 void CreateAnswer(CreateSessionDescriptionObserver* observer,
105 const cricket::MediaSessionOptions& session_options);
106
107 void SetSdesPolicy(cricket::SecurePolicy secure_policy);
108 cricket::SecurePolicy SdesPolicy() const;
109
110 void set_enable_encrypted_rtp_header_extensions(bool enable) {
111 session_desc_factory_.set_enable_encrypted_rtp_header_extensions(enable);
112 }
113
114 void set_is_unified_plan(bool is_unified_plan) {
115 session_desc_factory_.set_is_unified_plan(is_unified_plan);
116 }
117
118 // For testing.
119 bool waiting_for_certificate_for_testing() const {
120 return certificate_request_state_ == CERTIFICATE_WAITING;
121 }
122
123 private:
124 enum CertificateRequestState {
125 CERTIFICATE_NOT_NEEDED,
126 CERTIFICATE_WAITING,
127 CERTIFICATE_SUCCEEDED,
128 CERTIFICATE_FAILED,
129 };
130
131 // MessageHandler implementation.
132 virtual void OnMessage(rtc::Message* msg);
133
134 void InternalCreateOffer(CreateSessionDescriptionRequest request);
135 void InternalCreateAnswer(CreateSessionDescriptionRequest request);
136 // Posts failure notifications for all pending session description requests.
137 void FailPendingRequests(const std::string& reason);
138 void PostCreateSessionDescriptionFailed(
139 CreateSessionDescriptionObserver* observer,
140 const std::string& error);
141 void PostCreateSessionDescriptionSucceeded(
142 CreateSessionDescriptionObserver* observer,
143 std::unique_ptr<SessionDescriptionInterface> description);
144
145 void OnCertificateRequestFailed();
146 void SetCertificate(
147 const rtc::scoped_refptr<rtc::RTCCertificate>& certificate);
148
149 std::queue<CreateSessionDescriptionRequest>
150 create_session_description_requests_;
151 rtc::Thread* const signaling_thread_;
152 cricket::TransportDescriptionFactory transport_desc_factory_;
153 cricket::MediaSessionDescriptionFactory session_desc_factory_;
154 uint64_t session_version_;
155 const std::unique_ptr<rtc::RTCCertificateGeneratorInterface> cert_generator_;
156 const SdpStateProvider* sdp_info_;
157 const std::string session_id_;
158 CertificateRequestState certificate_request_state_;
159
160 std::function<void(const rtc::scoped_refptr<rtc::RTCCertificate>&)>
161 on_certificate_ready_;
162
163 RTC_DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN(WebRtcSessionDescriptionFactory);
164};
165} // namespace webrtc
166
167#endif // PC_WEBRTC_SESSION_DESCRIPTION_FACTORY_H_
168
